DOC.brief_summary: quasi-experimental study investigate whether metformin co-treatment would improve IVF outcome overweight obese woman PCOS .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Metformin In Vitro Fertilization Outcomes Overweight Obese PCOS Women
DOC.detailed_description: This non randomized prospective control `` metformin-free group '' study take place University IVF Center . The study include fifty-one overweight obese woman ( BMI > 25 ) PCOS underwent first fresh autologous IVF-embryo transfer cycle agree take metformin IVF cycle `` Metformin-treated group '' . A cross match cohort fifty-one cross match PCOS woman agree take study medication allocate control group `` Metformin-free group '' . The metformin-treated group receive metformin ( 1000 mg per day ) start control ovarian stimulation ( COH ) day pregnancy check . The primary outcome measure total number retrieve oocyte live birth rate .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion restrict patient 39 year old basal FSH < 10 IU/ml normal TSH prolacin . Exclusion criterion diabetes mellitus ( excluded GTT ) , renal liver disease , associate male factor , document tubal factor pelvic adhesion , elevate 17 alfa hydroxyprogesterone level FSH â‰¥10 IU/ml . We also exclude woman start program medication reduce weight partner abnormal semen parameter accord world health organization parameter ( WHO , 2010 )
